name: releases
displayName: Are the releases tagged in source control systems?

name: tracebility
displayName: How is tracebility between tasks/defects and releases tracked?

name: container technologies
displayName: Are there any container technologies such as docker being used to package builds?

name: package deployment
displayName: How are built package deployed to various environments such as dev/qa/uat/prod?

name: data migration
displayName: How is data migration related to database schema changes done?

name: administration scripts
displayName: Are startup/launch/batch/other administration scripts included in the deployment package?

name: roll back of software binaries and database schemas
displayName: What is the process for release rollback of software binaries and database schemas?

name: hardware/os level provisioning
displayName: What is the process for hardware/os level provisioning when creating new environments?

name: non-application softwares updates/refreshes
displayName: How are OS and other non-application softwares updates/refreshes performed?

name: average number of resources and time-per-resource
displayName: What is the average number of resources and time-per-resource spent for each each release?
